issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] serde_json is only used in tests but isn't in dev-dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9845](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9845). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is resolved by moving the dependency out of dependencies and into to dev-dependencies.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9845?focusedCommentId=17189615) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8087
